text: I am not completely new to HS but I had a newbie type question, so I have a Website Page that is in Draft mode but that also has a Password protected on it, when I go to the preview link even in a Incognito window (even though the page is not live, I do not get prompted to put in the password), the link does have the “?hs_preview=XXXXXX” but why in incognito it would not asked for the password that I set, does that password protect screen only appear when the page is published? Is there documentation that explains that

The `hs_preview` query parameter allows you to see that page live on your website even though it is not published. It also bypasses the password restriction so you can view your page. When you publish your page, the password protection will be there.
